segments.label: act-1
segments.title: Problem & Emotional Cost
segments.description: Hooks the audience by depicting the emotional consequences of compulsive spending and its impact on relationships.

segments.label: act-1_seq-1
segments.title: Opening Visual Montage
segments.description: Quick visuals of shopping, regret, and relational tension establish the problem visually.

segments.label: act-1_seq-1_scene-1
segments.title: Glimpses of Consequence
segments.description: Soft music plays over visuals: shopping, regretful faces, tense couples.

segments.label: act-1_seq-1_scene-1_shot-1
segments.description: A person smiles as they complete an online purchase.

segments.label: act-1_seq-1_scene-1_shot-2
segments.description: A sudden look of regret as they see the confirmation.

segments.label: act-1_seq-1_scene-1_shot-3
segments.description: Couple exchanges frustrated glances over a stack of bills.

segments.label: act-1_seq-1_scene-2
segments.title: Infographic: Scale of the Problem
segments.description: Infographic showing prevalence and resonance of shopping disorder, using diverse silhouettes & statistics.

segments.label: act-1_seq-1_scene-2_shot-1
segments.description: Animated silhouettes highlight affected population.

segments.label: act-1_seq-1_scene-2_shot-2
segments.description: Text overlays emphasize statistics and resonance.

segments.label: act-1_seq-1_scene-3
segments.title: Direct Empathy Address
segments.description: Dr. Leslie's opening empathy-based narration.
segments.narration_text: Ever felt that rush after clicking 'Buy Now,' only to be hit with regret moments later? Or maybe you've promised yourself, 'This is the last time'-but it never is. Sometimes, the ripple effect of these struggles quietly touches the people you love, creating stress and distance without you even realizing it. You're not alone. And it's not your fault. There is hope for healing-for you, and for the relationships that matter most.

segments.label: act-1_seq-1_scene-3_shot-1
segments.description: Empathetic montage with Dr. Leslie VO.
segments.narration_text: Ever felt that rush after clicking 'Buy Now,' only to be hit with regret moments later? Or maybe you've promised yourself, 'This is the last time'-but it never is. Sometimes, the ripple effect of these struggles quietly touches the people you love, creating stress and distance without you even realizing it. You're not alone. And it's not your fault. There is hope for healing-for you, and for the relationships that matter most.

segments.label: act-2
segments.title: Authority & Solution Introduction
segments.description: Dr. Leslie establishes authority and hope for change, shifting toward solutions.

segments.label: act-2_seq-1
segments.title: Meet Dr. Leslie
segments.description: Professional introduction with personal credibility.

segments.label: act-2_seq-1_scene-1
segments.title: Dr. Leslie on Camera
segments.description: Direct, warm address establishing authority.
segments.narration_text: Hi, I'm Dr. Leslie Davis. For over 20 years, I've helped people break free from compulsive behaviors-especially the kind that silently drain your finances, strain your relationships, and steal your peace of mind. Shopping addiction isn't just about money. It's about the emotional triggers, the stress, the 'quick fix' that turns into long-term regret. But here's the good news: You can take back control-and I can show you how.

segments.label: act-2_seq-1_scene-1_shot-1
segments.description: Dr. Leslie in professional setting, smiling empathetically.
segments.narration_text: Hi, I'm Dr. Leslie Davis. For over 20 years, I've helped people break free from compulsive behaviors-especially the kind that silently drain your finances, strain your relationships, and steal your peace of mind. Shopping addiction isn't just about money. It's about the emotional triggers, the stress, the 'quick fix' that turns into long-term regret. But here's the good news: You can take back control-and I can show you how.

segments.label: act-2_seq-2
segments.title: Introducing the Solution
segments.description: Narration of the solution's nature (scientific, practical, not just budgeting).

segments.label: act-2_seq-2_scene-1
segments.title: Program Philosophy
segments.description: Dr. Leslie explains program is CBT-based and habit focused.
segments.narration_text: That's why I created Retail Therapy Unplugged-a proven coaching program designed to help you break the cycle of compulsive spending. This isn't another cookie-cutter budgeting course. It's a science-backed approach with practical, evidence-based techniques inspired by psychology and Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, that will help you regain control and build a future you are proud of. We don't just focus on what you spend-we uncover why you spend, and how to build lasting habits that lead to financial freedom.

segments.label: act-2_seq-2_scene-1_shot-1
segments.description: Visuals of Dr. Leslie coaching, breakthrough moments, notes from clients.
segments.narration_text: That's why I created Retail Therapy Unplugged-a proven coaching program designed to help you break the cycle of compulsive spending. This isn't another cookie-cutter budgeting course. It's a science-backed approach with practical, evidence-based techniques inspired by psychology and Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, that will help you regain control and build a future you are proud of. We don't just focus on what you spend-we uncover why you spend, and how to build lasting habits that lead to financial freedom.

segments.label: act-3
segments.title: The Offer & Testimonials
segments.description: Breaks down each program tier and provides social proof via testimonials.

segments.label: act-3_seq-1
segments.title: Tier 3: Personalized Transformation Coaching
segments.description: Features and emotional promises of the top-tier program.

segments.label: act-3_seq-1_scene-1
segments.title: Transformation Overview
segments.description: Describes how one-on-one coaching achieves deep change.
segments.narration_text: Imagine waking up without that knot of anxiety about your spending. That's the transformation we aim for with our top-tier program: Personalized Transformation Coaching. This is one-on-one support tailored just for you. We'll identify your triggers, create a step-by-step action plan, and work through emotional roadblocks together-so the changes you make aren't just temporary. They're permanent.

segments.label: act-3_seq-1_scene-1_shot-1
segments.description: Montage: virtual sessions, breakthroughs, journaling, empowerment.
segments.narration_text: Imagine waking up without that knot of anxiety about your spending. That's the transformation we aim for with our top-tier program: Personalized Transformation Coaching. segments.label: act-3_seq-1_scene-2
segments.title: Transformation Benefits
segments.description: Highlights target audience & emotional results.
segments.narration_text: This level is perfect for high-achievers, professionals, or anyone ready to invest in deep, meaningful change. Because when your mindset shifts, your life shifts.

segments.label: act-3_seq-2
segments.title: Tier 2: Empowerment Group Coaching
segments.description: Presents group-based program and emotional support.

segments.label: act-3_seq-2_scene-1
segments.title: Group Coaching Experience
segments.description: Shows collaborative, community nature of offering.
segments.narration_text: Maybe you're looking for support-but you don't want to go it alone. That's where our Empowerment Group Coaching comes in. You'll join a community of people who get it. Together, we'll share wins, tackle challenges, and celebrate breakthroughs. These aren't just 'support groups'-they're transformation hubs where real change happens.

segments.label: act-3_seq-2_scene-1_shot-1
segments.description: Dynamic group calls, laughter, celebration.

segments.label: act-3_seq-3
segments.title: Tier 1: Self-Guided Freedom Program
segments.description: Promotes the independent/self-paced program tier.

segments.label: act-3_seq-3_scene-1
segments.title: Self-Paced Journey
segments.description: Highlights how independent learners will benefit.
segments.narration_text: Or maybe you prefer to work at your own pace? That's exactly why I created the Self-Guided Freedom Program. This interactive journey is packed with real-world strategies, exercises, and step-by-step modules designed to help you regain control-on your terms.

segments.description: People working on courses, sharing wins with friends.

segments.narration_text: This is perfect if you're motivated to create change independently but need the right tools to make it stick. You'll track your progress and celebrate your wins as you reach clear, definable goals.

segments.label: act-4
segments.title: Emotional Anchor, CTA & Close
segments.description: Anchors emotions, renews hope, presents clear call-to-action and brand close.

segments.label: act-4_seq-1
segments.title: Anchor & Transition
segments.description: Dr. Leslie acknowledges viewers' feelings, frames path to hope.

segments.label: act-4_seq-1_scene-1
segments.title: Dr. Leslie Encouragement
segments.description: Dr. Leslie's encouragement, close-up, hopeful delivery.
segments.narration_text: I know what it feels like to want change but not know where to start. This transformation journey isn't just about changing your spending habits-it's about reclaiming your peace of mind, rebuilding your confidence, and feeling proud of the progress you can see and feel in your everyday life. Once you understand why you spend, you unlock the power to change it-for good.

segments.description: Direct, inspiring call to the viewer to act now.

segments.narration_text: So, what's the next step for you? One-on-one coaching, group support, or a self-guided journey-each path leads to freedom. The question is: Are you ready to take the first step?

segments.narration_text: Your future starts now. Take our free self-assessment or enroll in one of our programs today.
